Get WordPress Categories

Source: R/helpers.R
wp_categories.Rd

This function helps you get your WordPress categories details so that you can use for your YAML header.

wp_categories(wordpress_url)

Arguments

wordpress_url

URL to your website

Value

A data frame with category ids and names

Examples

wordpress_url <- "https://rmd-wordpress.eu" # replace with your own (test) website
wp_categories(wordpress_url)

#>    id                 name
#> 1  22            category1
#> 2  23            category2
#> 3   7                 code
#> 4  21 Code and Other Stuff
#> 5  14       Code and Stuff
#> 6  20    CodeandOtherStuff
#> 7   6                 math
#> 8  15               newcat
#> 9   1           Non classé
#> 10 10                    R
#> 11 16        R Programming
